mapper.select: select * from TD_M_FUNCRIGHT f where f.RIGHT_CODE = #{rightCode}

select t.*,s.PARENT_MENU_ID,s.MENU_TITLE from TD_M_FUNCRIGHT t , TD_B_SYSTEMGUIMENU s where t.MOD_CODE = s.MENU_ID and ( s.MENU_ID in ( select s2.MENU_ID from TD_B_SYSTEMGUIMENU s2 start with ( s2.MENU_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{rightName}||'%' or s2.MENU_ID in ( select t2.MOD_CODE from TD_M_FUNCRIGHT t2 where t2.RIGHT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{rightName}||'%' ) ) connect by s2.PARENT_MENU_ID=prior s2.MENU_ID ) or s.MENU_ID in ( select s2.MENU_ID from TD_B_SYSTEMGUIMENU s2 start with ( s2.MENU_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{rightName}||'%' or s2.MENU_ID in ( select t2.MOD_CODE from TD_M_FUNCRIGHT t2 where t2.RIGHT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{rightName}||'%' ) ) connect by prior s2.PARENT_MENU_ID= s2.MENU_ID ))

select t.* , C.DEPART_NAME from TD_M_FUNCRIGHT t , TD_M_DEPART C where t.UPDATE_DEPART_ID = c.DEPART_ID
and t.RIGHT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{rightName}||'%'
and t.RIGHT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{rightCode}||'%'
and t.MOD_CODE LIKE '%'||#{modCode}||'%'
mapper.insert: Insert into TD_M_FUNCRIGHT (RIGHT_CODE, RIGHT_NAME, CLASS_CODE, RIGHT_ATTR, MOD_CODE, HELP_INDEX, REMARK, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_STAFF_ID, UPDATE_DEPART_ID) values ( #{rightCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightAttr,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{modCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{helpIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateStaffId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateDepartId,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update TD_M_FUNCRIGHT set RIGHT_NAME = #{rightName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASS_CODE = #{classCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIGHT_ATTR = #{rightAttr,jdbcType=CHAR}, MOD_CODE = #{modCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, HELP_INDEX = #{helpIndex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_STAFF_ID = #{updateStaffId,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_DEPART_ID = #{updateDepartId,jdbcType=CHAR} where RIGHT_CODE = #{rightCode}
